snippet.title: Hearthstone: Curse of Naxxramas
snippet.description:
► Hearthstone - Curse of Naxxramas: http://hearthstone.gamepedia.com/Curse_of_Naxxramas

► Ascii's Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/NerfedTV
► Ascii's Twitter: http://twitter.com/NerfedTV

The Curse of Naxxramas is Hearthstone first adventure mode. Comprised of 5 wings the player must defeat a series of bosses to unlock new cards. Players are able to tackle bosses in both normal and heroic mode with custom decks, as well as completing class challenges with a specially selected deck.

About GameChops:
 GameChops is a record label specializing in video game remixes, founded by Dj CUTMAN. Learn more at www.GameChops.com

Follow GameChops:
